ingredients.item: 400g pack Essential British Chicken Mini Breast Fillets
Squeeze of lemon or lime juice
1 fennel bulb (300g), sliced as thin as possible

instructions.step: Combine the five spice with ½ tsp freshly ground black pepper and a pinch of salt and sprinkle over the chicken pieces.

Cut the skin away from the orange. Working over a bowl to catch the fruit and juice, cut the orange segments from between the membrane. Tear the mint leaves into pieces and add to the bowl with the honey, garlic, lemon or lime juice and 1 tsp of the oil. Mix well.

Heat the remaining oil in a frying pan and fry the chicken for 3 minutes on each side until cooked through and there is no pink meat. Pile the fennel and chicory onto plates and arrange the chicken on top. Spoon the orange over the chicken and drizzle with the juices left in the bowl.
